question: Assalamu Alaikum Mufti Saheb. Someone called me Ibn Taymiyyah in my dream. What does that mean ?
answer:
QUESTION
I dreamt that i was running in the night in India, I don't know why but I knew i was in India. It was really dark. I saw people fighting: they were shooting the scene for a movie. I was afraid. I kept running, crossing all these people (actors) pretending to fight. Someone saw me and thought I was lost. He said to one of his child who was with him: go and show the way to ibn Taymiyyah. What does that mean ???
ANSWER


Share:
May Allah Ta?ala always guide you from darkness to light. He has guided all the righteous Ulama like ibn Taymiyah and others to light. May Allah Ta?ala also grant you Ilm-e-Deen (knowledge of Deen), Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
